name: .CPC File Extension
summary: Learn about .CPC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Bitmap image compressed using the Cartesian Perceptual Compression (CPC) algorithm; designed for compressing 1-bit raster images, such as black-and-white photographs and line art; often used for compressing monochrome design layouts, legal documents, and other types of scanned text files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Internet Explorer with Cartesian Products CPC View ax plugin
Mozilla Firefox with CPC Lite pi plugin
Apple Safari with Cartesian Products CoPyCat plugin
Mozilla Firefox with Cartesian Products CoPyCat plugin
